member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Location.LocationOptions
member.summary: Options for customizing

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Location.LocationOptions.None
member.summary: No options.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Location.LocationOptions.UseNativeControl
member.summary: Some of the channels (e.g. Facebook) has a built in location widget. Use this option to indicate if you want the LocationDialog to use it when available.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Location.LocationOptions.ReverseGeocode
member.summary: Use this option if you want the location dialog to reverse lookup geo-coordinates before returning. This can be useful if you depend on the channel location service or native control to get user location but still want the control to return to you a full address.
member.remarks: Due to the accuracy of reverse geo-coders, we only use it to capture , , , and
